channel.title: TheDragonRing's Blog
channel.description: The home website of a 13 year old programmer who is continually confused by his own code and addicted to reading books.

item.title: Building Websites
item.description: A walkthrough on how I built my site from scratch, and the advantages and difficulties of doing it that way.
item.author: thedragonring.bod@gmail.com (TheDragonRing)
